alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Baca and east central Las Animas Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 217 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Kim, or 31 miles west of Springfield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Baca and east central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
